value.title: How to create Sparklines, indicators and conditional formatting in Power BI Paginated Reports

He shows you how to create sparklines, indicators and conditional formatting within the Paginated Report using Report Builder.  LET'S CONNECT! value.title: Inside Power Query reference queries for Power BI and Excel

Chris also looks at how change the behavior to make things a bit faster.  Data Privacy Blog: https://blog.crossjoin.co.uk/2018/12/27/data-privacy-settings-data-refresh-performance-power-bi-excel/
